Class CreditCard

java.lang.Object
BankCard
CreditCard
public class CreditCard extends BankCard
This is the credit card class which is the child class of BankCard The client can request credit, and is granted the amound if all the eligibility criteria is met. S/he can also cancel their credit card if required
Author:
Dibbeshwor Acharya
